group_1.textRight: Sorry～@Phone call took longer than I thought.

group_1.textLeft: Oh, Miyurin's here!
There's a little something I wanted to apologize for…

group_1.textRight: Which is…?

group_1.textLeft: Sorry, I kinda knocked over your bag…

group_1.textRight: Is that it? That's perfectly fine?
…Wait, Princess, that thing in your hand…!
(My circle checklist…!)

group_1.textLeft: Oh yeah, what's this? A shopping list?

group_1.textRight: (I was talking to Rui about new releases.)
(She said it's best not to reveal too much,)
(so I'm gonna keep this under wraps for now, and…)

group_1.textLeft: Like, "Gurlz, Glasses, and Machine Gunz",@what's that? A girls manga?

group_1.textRight: [chara:103201:effect_emotion_surprise_0][se:7226_shock]?!
Y-yeah!@That's our Princess, spotting that one.
The main character is a flashy girl, but when she@puts on glasses, her personality changes.
It's an action-girls manga about fighting evil@with machine guns…!
(…Ack, I was supposed to cover up!)

group_1.textLeft: Whaaat?! That sounds super interesting!
…Are you going to a doujinshi convention, Miyuri?

group_1.textRight: Doh-jin-shee convention…?

group_1.textLeft: …What's that?

group_1.textRight: Shigure, you know about doujinshi conventions?

group_1.textLeft: I've never been to any.@Only heard about them online.
…Is that, maybe…
what's called a circle checklist…?
The heck is that? This cutie's really curious now!

group_1.textRight: (…Huh? Is it not as niche of a hobby as Rui said…?)
(If Shigure knows about it too,@then I guess it's okay if I talk about it!)
Well, um, a doujinshi convention is sorta like…

group_1.textLeft: Hmm, so there are all kinds of fanmade books@and games for sale?

group_1.textRight: I didn't know the pros went to these, too…@Sounds like it's always a fun time...
I thought "thin books" were all adult-rated stuff.
But it sounds like they're not all like that…
There are lots of different subcultures, aren't there?

group_1.textLeft: What kinds of things are you shopping for, Miyuri?

group_1.textRight: I'm not picky when it comes to genres.
I'm on the lookout for works with great depictions@of legs!

group_1.textLeft: Legs…?
You sure love the Instructor's legs, dont'cha?
You got a leg fetish?

group_1.textRight: Yeah, yeah! Lady San's legs are exceptional!
But-but the way legs are shown from one work@to another to another…
Seeing those differences is also great!
I just have so many circles I wanna go to@that I can't keep up with my checklist…
I've gotta prioritize things or I'm going to@blow through my spending money…

group_1.textLeft: Oh my…

group_1.textRight: I mean, considering the effort the creators put in,
the works themselves are actually pretty cheap.
Still, I don't care how much it costs if I get to see@a god's work…
That's what I've been saving up my pocket change@for!
It's worth it!

group_1.textLeft: You're so stoked about this, I'm cracking up!
Sounds like it's a pretty huge event, though.★

group_1.textRight: It is, it is!

group_1.textLeft: Anyway, like, why are you so into legs, Miyurin?
For example, how about this cutie's legs?@You like 'em?

group_1.textRight: Of course I do! Is it really okay if I talk about them?!
